title: Things to do
text:
1) Finish coding project.
2) Buy groceries
3) Take wife out to dinner.
4) Attend daughter's rehearsal

title: Reminder
text: Don't forget to turn in the college application by this Saturday!!!!

title: Story Ideas
text:
Malcolm and Geneva have their final showdown at the ruined city. Little does Malcolm know, Geneva has already set 
traps beforehand and is planning to ambush him!!!
